main_characters.name: Mr. Dursley
main_characters.description: The director of a firm called Grunnings, a big, beefy man with hardly any neck and a large mustache.

main_characters.name: Mrs. Dursley
main_characters.description: Thin and blonde, with nearly twice the usual amount of neck, spends time spying on neighbors.

main_characters.name: Dudley Dursley
main_characters.description: The small son of Mr. and Mrs. Dursley, considered by them to be the finest boy anywhere.

main_characters.name: Albus Dumbledore
main_characters.description: A tall, thin, and very old man with long silver hair and a purple cloak, who arrives mysteriously.

main_characters.name: Professor McGonagall
main_characters.description: A severe-looking woman who can transform into a cat, wearing an emerald cloak.

main_characters.name: Voldemort
main_characters.description: The dark wizard who has caused fear and chaos, but has mysteriously disappeared.

main_characters.name: Harry Potter
main_characters.description: The young boy who survived Voldemort's attack, becoming a significant figure in the wizarding world.

main_characters.name: Lily Potter
main_characters.description: Harry's mother, who is mentioned as having been killed by Voldemort.

main_characters.name: James Potter
main_characters.description: Harry's father, who is mentioned as having been killed by Voldemort.

main_characters.name: Hagrid
main_characters.description: A giant man who is caring and emotional about Harry's situation.

background_setting.time_period: A dull, gray Tuesday morning, Late 20th Century
